Subject: New feature

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 433
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I just noticed we have 'Photos' section in this group.  I expect 
all the only things put there to be screen shots.  If I find certain 
other things which I consider offensive in the Photos area, I will 
restrict access to who can upload to that area.  Unfortunately, both 
Files and Photos share the same settings for access controls.

Is there a general way to get complete pictures of maps without using 
the print screen method?
